title: National Institute for Mathematical Sciences
summary: The National Institute for Mathematical Sciences (NIMS; Korean: 국가수리과학연구소) is a Korean government-funded mathematics research institute. Their work focuses both basic research and applied mathematics with  industrial and medical applications.[1] NIMS became an affiliated research institute of the Institute for Basic Science in 2012.[2] After delays for multiple years,[3] relocation is planned for late 2023.[4]
